org.hibernate.service.spi

Interface Stoppable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClassLoaderService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    C3P0ConnectionProvider, ClassLoaderServiceImpl, DataSourceBasedMultiTenantConnectionProviderImpl, DatasourceConnectionProviderImpl, DriverManagerConnectionProviderImpl, HikariCPConnectionProvider, JmxServiceImpl, JtaAwareConnectionProviderImpl, OsgiClassLoader, OSGiClassLoaderServiceImpl, OsgiServiceUtil, ProxoolConnectionProvider

    public interface Stoppable
    Lifecycle contract for services which wish to be notified when it is time to stop.
